QuestData.Title: Despondent Ablutions
QuestData.Description: You return. A surprise. Perhaps there is still hope.$b$bIn victory or defeat, you bear the weight of this place. It hangs on you like a mantle. I see your struggle to bear it.$b$bThere is, perhaps, a way to shrug off this burden. An altar, to the northwest. Built by the tidesages, seeking to wash away the corruption.$b$bOffer yourself to the idol. It will exact a price, as do all things. But in communion you may claw back from the brink.
QuestData.CompletionText: Find the circle, pierce the veil. Only in oblivion can you find it.
QuestData.RewardText: Your mind has rejected madness, and replaced it with determination. For now.
